description.en: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.ar: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.br: Invoca um jogador para você (Tempo de conjuração: 30s). Este item só funciona em personagens que estão no mesmo continente ou na mesma instância.
description.cns: 召唤朋友的晶球(等待时间30秒)
description.de: Ruft einen Spieler zu dir (30 Sekunden Beschwörungszeit). Nur auf Charaktere anwendbar, welche sich auf dem gleichen Kontinent oder in der gleichen Instanz befinden.
description.fi: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.fil: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.fr: Parchemin invoquant l'un de vos amis à vos côtés (Incantation 30s).
description.id: Panggil pemain kepadamu (30 detik: Casting Time). Item ini hanya berfungsi pada karakter di benua yang sama atau di instance yang sama.
description.it: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.jp: 友達をこの場へ呼び出してくれる神秘のオーブ。同じ大陸でのみ使用できます。(待機時間30秒)
description.kr: 시전 시간 없이 곧바로 친구를 소환시켜주는 신비의 구슬
description.nl: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.pl: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.ru: Переносит к вам выбранного игрока. Требует 30 секунд на применение.
description.sp: Invoca a un jugador hacia ti (30 seg: Tiempo de Lanzamiento). Este objeto sólo funciona en personajes del mismo continente o de la misma instancia.
description.sw: Summon a player to you (30 sec: Casting Time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.th: เรียกผู้เล่นมาหาคุณ (30 วินาที: เวลาร่าย) ไอเท็มนี้ใช้ได้เฉพาะกับตัวละครในทวีปเดียวกันหรือในกรณีเดียวกัน
description.tw: 召喚玩家到你身旁，被召喚的玩家須和你在同一大陸或同一分流。(須對象同意召喚、詠唱時間30秒)
description.vi: Triệu tập một người chơi cho bạn (30 giây: Thời gian truyền). Mục này chỉ hoạt động trên các nhân vật trên cùng một lục địa hoặc trong cùng một trường hợp.
